title: 103_hr2067
content: Authorizes the Secretary of the military department concerned to pay monthly transitional and indemnity compensation to the dependents or former dependents of a member of the armed forces who is separated from service after conviction for an offense involving the abuse of one of those dependents . Outlines provisions concerning: (1) appropriate payment recipients, (2) payment commencement, duration and amount, and (3) forfeiture of the right to such payments .
